data.text: @DeondreSmiles This image, now an intensified .gif. Definitely 1000% in danger. I hate this decision.
@DeondreSmiles OSU to drop mask mandate in most work place
@DeondreSmiles Saaaame 😭😭. We did that last year and it lasted 3-4 weeks before we brought back the mandates
@DeondreSmiles we know that Seattle/Vancouver/BC will all unmask together for their mutual $$ benefit
@DeondreSmiles Whew, you could still be in #Ohio, where people take exceptionalism and willful defiant ignorance to new Teflon heights
